subject: Re: EVP questions_can anyone help ?
author: itcdeadpeople
full_text:
Hi Lyn.  I'm sure several of us here could help you.  What are your questions? 

Margaret

--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "Lyn" <angels4lyn@...> wrote:
>
> HI
> I'm one of the quiet members here.  trying to learn from everyone.
> I have activity in my home. so I purchased an RCA digital recorder
> which is amazing.
> I have captured several EVPs, some quite clear, some a bit too fast
> so I slow it down to hear it. some are voices , some answer questions, some 
> are just noises.
> 
> does anyone have experience with EVPs on digital recorders ?
> I have a ton of questions...  and need advice on some of them.
> 
> thanks
> Lyn
> angels4lyn@...
>
